title: Isu ka hmangaih che ka ta i ni e
lyrics:
Isu ka hmangaih che, ka ta i ni e,
I hming vangin ka sual zawng ka kalsan e;
Ka Tlantu, Ka Chhandamtu pawh i ni e,
Hmanah aiin tunah ka hmangaih zawk che.

Ka hmangaih che, min khawngaihtu i ni e,
Sual ngaihdamna min pe, kraws-a khenbehin;
Hlinglukhum khum vangin ka hmangaih a che,
Hmanah aiin tunah ka hmangaih zawk che.

Ka damlai chhungin ka hmangaih fo vang che,
Mi dang hnenah pawh i thu ka hril fan ang;
Ka thih dawn hunin he thu hi ka sawi ang,
Hmanah aiin tunah ka hmangaih zawk che.

Van in nuam takah chuan ka lo thlen hunin,
Ropuina leh lawmna eng mawi takah chuan,
Lallukhum khumin he hla hi ka sa ang,
Hmanah aiin tunah ka hmangaih zawk che.
